stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Class is a SURE FAIL, stay clear of this professor. He assigns 3 tests and optional final and 2 take home tests that\'s worth 18pts towards 2 of ur 3 tests. Test study guide has approx 14 questions where the test will have 43 questions. He tries to trick u on tests, doesn\'t go by the book at all! Very monotoned, don\'t expect an A. BYE BYE GPA!!

comments: LITERALLY if you go to class and take good notes, and listen to what he\'s saying you will at least pass the test. There\'s nothing else, just 3 test, the fourth is optional. GREAT teacher though, very knowledgeable.

comments: This teacher is really hard because he acts as if you already know about the subject. I goes off on tangents about everything and then you are confused on what it is you were to learn. The test are nothing like the notes. He is very unclear and almost every person I have talked to in his class is failing.
